Cherry (including sour) Powdery mildew: Prune for open canopy and excellent air circulation, avoid excess nitrogen fertilizer, plant in full sun with good spacing, apply sulfur, potassium bicarbonate, or myclobutanil preventively from petal fall, remove and destroy fallen leaves in autumn.
Cherry (including_sour) healthy: Maintain open canopy through proper summer and winter pruning, ensure good airflow and morning sun exposure, avoid late-season nitrogen, water at base not overhead, monitor regularly and apply preventive fungicide only if history of infection exists in the area.
